remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
csbief.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
csbief.2 $e |- F/_ x C $.
csbief.3 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
csbief $p |- [_ A / x ]_ B = C $.
$d A x $.
